thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Snyder

author: Snyder
title: Snyder
text:
Have always had great experience with this travel company - everything is handled down to the little details and makes it for a stress free booking. I have found every tour they recommend has been great and exactly what I would have picked had I made my own picking.
Only down side is they book the domestic and international flights separately thus that can be a hassle at the airport. Also, they have you confirm 24 hours in advance every tour/pick up you have -which for the longer trips gets a little excessive. Although I believe this is more CYA rather than necessity.
